typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Ship Mode} as string,
		Segment as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Category as string,
		{Sub-Category} as string,
		Sales as decimal(10,0) '$###,###,###.###',
		Quantity as decimal(10,0),
		Discount as decimal(10,0) '$###,###,###.###',
		Profit as string,
		{Shipping Cost} as decimal(10,0),
		Returns as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StoreCSV
StoreCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
